caption: Awesome taste.
Food isn't that good and staff were kinda of ignorant
Phenomenal service, the manager Tony is really fantastic. Handsome too.
WORST PLACE I HAVE EVER WORKED AT , MANAGER PUT HOT SAUCE IN MY EYE . ALEX , HE NEVER GOT PUNISHED FOR IT AND TREATED EMPLOYEES VERY POORLY BECAUSE HE HAD AUTHORITY. HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED !

We literally both just got off of a 13 hour shift at the hospital both lost four patients between the two of us all we wanted was a pizza we ordered a pizza and some cinnamon sticks 20 minutes before they closed and we were told that they were “already closing”. After ordering the pizzas online and showing up at the store 10 minutes later, no one spoke a single word to us. I order pizza from papa John’s frequently, however, I will absolutely never be ordering from papa johns again after this service.
Was in the shop for a full 5 minutes and no one talked to me, at all. I’ve had problems with this shop before and thought it was one off. Not the case. Avoid. Avoid. Avoid.

Took over 3 hours to deliver my pizza. I called the store multiple times to find out what happened to my pizza because the tracker said it was delivered. The girl on the phone kept claiming that DoorDash wasn’t responding to the orders from the store but I never placed my order through an outside delivery service. Horrible management at this location! Wish I didn’t have to use them as my closest and only delivery option.
Quick and friendly service.

I would give this store a 0 but it is not an option. We have ordered from them three times. The first two times it came 3 hours late. This time, it never came at all!!!! Now I am trying to get my money back and can not get through to them via phone and my emails are being ignored. I will never order from this location again.
Great coocked. Fast delivery.
Perfectly cooked. Perfect amount of sauce to cheese ratio. High fives to the cooks tonight!

I just ordered from here; used my expiring coupon bucks ($10 off). Both items were flavorless, undercooked, and delivery overpriced. First time I've regretted using a coupon.  There are thousands of places to get pizza in Chicago. Avoid this one.

The delivery person never completed delivery.  When we called the store, the person first refused to resolve, then claimed the "general manager" approved the redelivery. An hour later, we called for status.  The person who answered the phone was belligerent.  Claimed the pizza was still in process,  and the GM was too busy to talk. It is now 3.5 hours and there is no response.
Every time I try to order a pizza online they immediately cancel my order.

1. My pizza was never delivered 2. When I called the location, they put me on hold for 10 minutes, then hung up on me. 3. I called again, and when the location picked up, was completely unable to provide any details on when the driver picked up my order nor any contact information on the driver. Had terrible attitude the entire time.
Best pizza ever. The philly cheese steak pizza delicious
It’s papa johns.  🙅🏼‍♂️
One of the employees threatened to kick me out when I was singing a song quietly to myself not even disturbing anyone
Giving a 1 star for the meme potential
(Translated by Google) They are not very friendly but ok  (Original) No son muy amables pero ok

They get no stars! One of their drivers authorized a tip amount without my consent. They did say they refunded me for the tip amount, but their customer service was beyond poor. They were rude to me, and above all they didn't seem to care that he did that. I spoke to the manager at this location and mentioned to him that the driver didn't have the receipt with him and so i ended up not being able to sign it. So, of course the tip amount line was blank since he didn't have the receipt with him. I called the store soon after the driver left my home to make them aware that if they do see a tip amount it wasn't from me or authorized with my signature. He went on to say that " we don't employ people like that so no need to worry" I get a call back from another manager within five minutes after i hung up with him and said the driver DID leave a tip for himself! I called their customer service headquarters to inform them. This driver messed with the wrong customer.  I had two babies upstairs that i couldn't leave unattended for me to wait for him to go back to his car to get the receipt. I ALWAYS tip but this is beyond what someone should take upon themselves to do that. I am NEVER GOING TO BE A PAPA JOHNS CUSTOMER EVER AGAIN!
Take to long
Horrible service

Delivery was two hours late, customer service put us through the ringer saying it’s out for delivery for a whole hour, and that’s when we could even reach someone which was less than half the time. Finally went to go get food elsewhere and they show up with no explanation. Terrible customer service

This is beyond the worst customer service and management that I have ever seen in a restaurant. The manager needs to be fired.  She lied multiple times about my order and hung up on me three times forcing me to call back. This location needs to be shut down immediately.  It took 2 hours and I still never received my pizza

We ordered 2 medium pizzas from this location today. We ordered, the estimated time of delivery was 50-60 minutes. It's been 2 hours and we still haven't received our order. We have called 4 times, and they never answered.  Will definitely avoid this location again.  Edit: we recieved the pizza over 2.5 hours after we ordered it, and the delivery person said that they are a doordash deliverer, and picked up the order from Papa Johns 15 minutes before they arrived to us, as per their instructions.  Edit to address the Response from the owner: We did email the office at that email and got an out of office response.

Absolute garbage location. Waited for my food for two hours, had to call corporate to get any kind of response because the store itself refused to answer their phones and would immediately hang up on me when they did. This went on for 45 minutes. When the food finally did come it had to go in the oven because it was cold. DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS LOCATION!!!! Embarrassing and should be shut down.
Can't get enough of their pizza. We love the thin crust pizza. Be sure to ask if they have any specials going. Some of the locations won't give you a discount if you don't ask.
Ordered a pizza waited an hour and half and they claimed my phone number was busy. When I asked for a refund Jenny hung up on me. Never got my food.

so far its been over an hour and 20 minutes. called in and they cant find their delivery driver. if it were winter and bad weather id be like ok, but ita 50 degrees out and clear skys and they cant find their driver? really? i cant wait to get this probably cold food
Terrible customer service and unsanitary handling of food

There’s is a lack of attention at this location. We ordered our pizza and breadsticks at 6pm. Pizza was delivered around 7:30 and it was room temperature. No breadsticks. We call to complain and were reassured our order would be redone and get to us within 30 min. About an hour later and still nothing. At this point we’re looking for a refund because it’s been 3 hours and we can’t seem to get our order of two items. So frustrating. The only reason I give it any stars is because what I assume to be the manager had a nice tone and attempted to be accommodating on the phone.
Pretty good pizza -- better than others at the price. Delivery came 45 minutes early. ( That's nice )

Waited until order was 30 minutes late before calling. When we called, they said we should be getting a call any minute that the driver is there. Waited until 20 minutes, still no delivery. Never received. Definitely do not order from here - very dissappointing.
My delivery time was 7:55PM - 8:05PM And I waited 20 minutes over the time my food was supposed to be delivered. Very disappointed and dissatisfied.

I ordered from this location and I waited 2 hours, called the store to request an update on my order and the store manager, Serina, said that I had buzzed the driver into the building, and then refused to open my door to take the pizza??? She also said she had seen me try to call the driver multiple times and the driver had cancelled my order because we didn't answer the door. Not only did we wait this whole time and didn't get a pizza, but the "Manager" hung up on me, said it was my fault, and then said that I had refused service to get the pizza, which makes 0 sense because that is the only reason we ordered from there...... This is incredibly frustrating since I order from this location MULTIPLE times.
Pizza never came. Called asking where it was and they said it wasn’t coming and they didn’t know why. They acted like this happens a lot.

Ordered a pizza online and waited an hour before calling the store. A store worker rudely told me  that my order had been canceled because the delivery time was up to 4 hours. When I asked how I was suppose to know my order was cancelled she told me to check my email and hung up on me. Terrible service!

They don't honor the specials sent out by email! When I tried to call to talk to a manager they played  "Let's make a deal" with me for a different amount $ instead of just honoring the national advertisement. I've never heard of this for such a large chain.

Your typical greasy and heavy but tasty Papa John's so necessary at times but obviously there's better pizza places in the city. My main problem is that they're consistently much later than the delivery estimate (I'm currently waiting on the pizza I ordered 90 minutes ago but was supposed to be here within 45). They're normally polite when I call and ask if it's out for delivery but they can't give more information than that. If I'm being charged double the delivery fee compared to other cities I'd at least expect my pizza to arrive on time.

This place is horrible. I've been to many Papa Johns and this by far is the WORST. I ordered my food with uber eats and after I placed the order it said it would be arriving in the next 20 minutes. I was okay with that, still questioning the time as I am a DePaul student right down the street. As I came down to wait the last 5 minutes, the time went up 5 more minutes each time, then ten minutes, then another ten minute. I thought it was UberEats fault, so I called the restaurant and asked what the hold up was and the lady said there were many uber cars that came but no one had a "bag". I then asked her if someone picked up the food then and she said someone is on their way. I hung up and the timer went another 15 minutes. So I waited 40 minutes for CHEESE STICKS which SHOULD NOT take that long. The uber driver said that it was the restaurants fault because they didn't give the food to the first driver that came originally came. Your food might not be that hot anymore since it took so long. She was right. I was VERY disappointment and refuse to refer this place to anyone, I didn't even want the rest of the cheese sticks I ordered, and I definitely will NOT be referring DePaul students to come here. Horrible Service. Never again.
Good pizza
Not accepting orders after 1am even though open til 2
Terrible food! Bad Service!

(Translated by Google) It is a terrible service they have me waiting for more than 35 minutes and they say that someone took my order who thinks I have time to continue waiting for a very messy pizza the employees do not even know what they are doing  (Original) Es un pésimo servicio me tienen esperando más de 35 minutos y que dice que alguien se llevó mi orden que piensa que tengo tiempo para seguir esperando por una pizza muy desordenado los empleados no saben ni lo que hacen

Welp as I’ve seen with a lot of other reviews this place has a habit of never delivering your food and then is unresponsive shen you try to call them out on it. Honestly is freaking ridiculous that you take an order and never even bother to call or tell your customer you’re not even going to bring them their pizza. Or have an idiot for a driver who probably delivered it to the wrong place! Honestly furious.

This place has terrible service and their customer service is even worse.  One time when I ordered from this place, they didn't even ask me to sign anything. I just showed up and they gave me the pizza and I asked if I had to sign anything and they said no. So that is kind of a big problem especially if the delivery driver is an idiot and goes to the wrong place or delivers to the wrong guy which is what happened the next time I ordered.  Last week when I ordered a pizza, the expected delivery time was about 30-40 minutes. Papa Johns allows me to use the Zoomer App to track our delivery driver. I use it and I thought that he was on his way and well he took a long stop at the wrong place far away... So 1 hour and 30 minutes passes by..... and I call and ask where is this guy? The person answers the phone and says your order is complete and then hangs up. I had to then call about 10 times before I could get someone to pick up again and I called to cancel and told them how the delivery driver is an idiot and probably delivered the wrong place.  And 20 minutes later I was walking to carry out from Pizza Hut and the incompetent delivery driver calls me and says he'll be there in 4 minutes. I had no idea who he was, he just called and said "I'll be there in 4 minutes," He sounded creepy and I had to double check and ask who he was and he said this in a creepy way "Who am I? Who am I? I am the delivery guy" and I told this creep that I cancelled a while ago.  Oh and it gets worse. I go on the Papa Johns website to fill out a Feedback Form to explain to them how pissed I was at their service and how incompetent it was. They never responded to me. In fact, it wasn't until today I found out that they closed the complaint with no response/comments even though they never responded to me at any point. I've had to call the customer service line many times to talk about how garbage the service is here and how the owner doesn't care and the customer service is pathetic here. They said they would escalate it to higher service and at the end? All they did was call this store and because it is a franchise, they decided to just not care about my situation.  The service here is the epitome of a disgrace and so is the owner.

This place is the worst establishment I have ever dealt with ! Worst customer service ever with Extremely DISRESPECTFUL and unprofessional employees !! I waited THREE HOURS for my pizza that I never received and called twice to check on the status of delivery. The manager was so rude and ignorant hung up on me twice.  when I asked her to have the driver call me that way I can know when to expect him and also refused to give me her name. she LIED and said the driver came and we didn’t answer the call. How can that be true when we have our number accurately stored on grub hub and called previously about our order.. I told her i would be filing a complaint if she did not give me her name and said "I DONT F****** CARE" and hung up on me. Completely uncalled for and unnecessary attitude from these employees when it could have been handled in a different way. Never got our food and no apology from these disrespectful employees. They need to get new management in here.  If I can give them a negative 10 rating I would. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR YOUR MONEY HERE YOU WILL REGRET IT.

Worst pizza place ever waited 3 hours called the never came n refused to refund money. Said they called but didnt. Horrible customes service horrible management. This place needs to close there establishment. I wish i would have red the reviews 1st. So disappointed

Waited over 3 hours for food that I never recived worst place to order from....... if I could give 10 negative stars I would this is the worst manager, very ignorant hung up 3x when I called to deal with this issue.. STAY AWAY BE VARY AWAWRE.. RUN
I love papa John's but the service at this place is terrible...2.5 hours for a pizza... Not worth it

Horrible, disgusting place! I just left this location on Clark street at 3:55 pm on monday May 21, 2018. Since the staff in this location is very small and frequently there are only around two employees in the whole place, they get away with a lot of bad behavior. I called in today politely and asked them if they had any specials, as I have done many times in the past. This time when I got a papa john's representative, a white male, who was very rude. He told that they "had a lot of specials" that day. I chuckled and said "awesome, what are they?" And he said "there were too many, he was not going to list all of them." I was taken aback at first and thought he was kidding, and then I realized her was serious. He said "just tell me what pizza you want and tell you if it's in special." I told him, I wasn't sure what pizza I wanted. How many specials are there exactly? I heard a click and then I asked "well can you please tell me about your single pie specials?", only to find out the man had just rudely hung up. I was appalled. I called back and asked him why he hung up on me. He said because he felt like it or something to that affect. I said I was going to come down into the store this is unacceptable. So i walk down to the store and I asked him if he was the one who just hung up on me. He said "mostly likely, so? What's the big deal?" I said excuse me? I've worked in hospitality for almost 10 years (not in a pizza shop) but I would never treat customers like that it's so professional. I also confronted him and saidthat I saw the sign outside that listed the specials and their were only two. Both single pie deals. So why exactly did he make it seem as though there were 20 specials he had to read off. Mind you, the store was completely empty, so he was not busy. He was just standing there doing nothing the whole time. I once again tell him this is no way to talk to customers and I hope those phone calls are recorded. He then, this is the part where it gets even more ridiculous, starts cursing and yelling at me and then tell me to "get the F*** out." The whole time I was talking to him, I was not yelling, I was as respectful as one could be in the situation and calm while he was erratic. I then told him, "oh, so now you're yelling and cursing at customers who would like to buy pizza as well?" I asked him for his name and he refuses to give it to me. Probably because he knows he was breaking rules. I asked if I order a pizza would his name be on the receipt. He said no. I told him I don't feel comfortable ordering with you is there any other employee in here. He says there's one in the back, I say perfect can you please ask him to come out. He says no. So I say I will wait until the employee comes out from the back. He says once again I have to "get the F*** out if I'm not ordering" (as if I would order from the man yelling and cursing at me and being completely unapologetic. I sit there quietly and wait for the other employee to appear. Finally a man comes out from the back. I ask him what is the man's name who was cursing at me. He says his name was "Mike". I ask him if he's the general manager or the shift manager, he alleges he doesn't know because he's new and looks nervous. I asked him if I could order with him, and he says no I would have to order from "mike". This "mike" person said he would call the police to coerce me to leave. I say that's fine, once they get here I will get your name &leave. While I am in the store, I called corporate to report him. The police come i gladly agree to leave and ask them to ask his name. They ask his name he says "mike" and refuses to give his last name. The police say corporate can verify his real name since they will have the employees schedule. While I was sitting there waiting for the police to come quietly, the "mike" person who alleged he was a manager is STARING at me menacingly as if to make me uncomfortable. It was insane. This man should not be working in customer service. It was scary. Then I decide to take a photo of him and he tries to hide and takes a photo of me. .

I ordered a pizza at 7p and it didn't get delivered until 1025p. Apparently they tried to deliver it but the delivery person had the wrong phone number. How that happened, I'm not sure. They didn't even call me when the delivery person brought back the pizza. I had to call the store to get an update, and then they told me the problem. Not worth it, I'd suggest any other pizza delivery.
Best pizza on the planet! I especially liked the All Meats pizza!
Dejanay the phone rep/customer service did an amazing job and went above and beyond after I tried ordering from the division location which was a castrosophe

While certainly not a top tier pizza joint like Lou Malnati's, Papa John's is a pretty good place to grab pizza on a budget. It's a pretty typical, no frills pizza, that will get in your hands and, subsequently, stomach, quickly. Dining in at this location isn't really an option - it's definitely a take-out place.

Hi, I ordered pizza at 7pm, the email said I would get the pizza in 22-32 mins. I called around 7:45pm. Crystal from the store told me that the delivery guy forgot the pizza, so she is going to send the pizza which was baked 45 mins ago when he returns. I asked for fresh pizza she initially refused to do a fresh one. Then she agreed to do a fresh pizza and would take 45 more mins.  Then the GM named Serina tunstill took the call and said she is the GM and started saying that delivery guy brought the pizza but you didnt pick the call which is a lie and conflicting. Then she was rude and started saying that either cancel it or wait for 40 more mins and said that I dont have any option and they didnt even apologize for the delay and when I asked to do something for inconvenience they refused. She said I am the GM and even if you complain, it would be coming to me.  Terrible customer service!! Papa john's dont care about people and delays.  Dont order from this location!!! Avoid it.
Nice and fast!
(Translated by Google) Good pizza fast  (Original) Pizza boa, rápida

Worstest place in history soon as the boss leaves his staff are very ghetto and disrespectful and especially the young Girl name "Serina" she think she is ms hot stuff  I will be reporting this store to corporate
Crappy chain pizza, glorified Little Caesars

Terrible customer service. Delivered burnt pizza. Called back to no response. Contacted corporate customer service and they promised me on several occasions that management from the store would correct the situation. It's been 2 months and no one has made this right.  Terrible management at this location and my corporate service in general

Worst customer service. I called over the phone and place an order of small pizza with onions. And I get in the store 3 Min after I hung up. And he said I’m sorry I didn’t hear what topping you said so I inserted pepperoni instead . I said I’m vegetarian and I don’t eat pork. He had the nerve to pull the pepperoni out of the pizza and throw onions while half of the cheese is out of the pizza. I would never recommend any one to trust any of the workers at this location.

They will give you a pepperconchini that is bit, and then claim you are lying! Absolutely the worst papa johns location by far! Thanks to the rude girl Serina for hanging up on me! Look up the word "work ethic" when you have free time. I hope you have a lot of it after I report you to the corporate.

Terrible - first, and last time I'll order delivery from this location (would give 0 stars, if possible).  I wish I had looked at the reviews before placing my order - 100% correct about avoiding delivery from this location. Driver called telling me my street is closed, when I said it wasn't he insisted it was and told me to go outside and look at my street, so I did...and, it was not closed. Turns out he was a couple miles north of me, then refused to follow the directions I offered to get to my apartment, then hung up. Called the store and talked to a woman who told me I should call the driver back since I have his # now and she doesn't know what to do. Cool.  Don't order delivery here if you actually want to get your food.
Always great pizza and welcoming staff members.

Pizza wasn't too warm and pizza taste like something you could make at home.  Also there was a receipt ontop of the pizza. Why would I want paper ontop of my pizza. There were also spilled bbq sauce, all over the box and my bbq sauce hasn't been open. I do not believe I will be ordering or dinning at this franchise no time soon.

DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE.  1st call - woman answer's rudely says "hang on" no hello no thanks for calling papa john's, then proceeds to disconnect me.  2nd call - someone answers places me on hold, after 2 minutes, i hang up.  3rd call - now it's a game to me, someone answers, places me on hold, 3 minutes goes by and im disconnected.  4th call - it rings, and it rings. Oh does it ring. I leave it ringing go to the men's room, fold some tshirts, come back downstairs about 10 minutes later and its still ringing. Never stops ringing, i hang up.  5th call - If i ever get thru i am going to order 5 orders while periodically placing them on separate holds and right before the order is complete im going to tell them i feel like thai actually cancel the order ;)  EDIT- wow after like 12 tries i got thru, i asked for 2 pies for pickup, she said whatchu want on them then? I said pep........and she hung up on me. Lol okay im done. GL to u if you're dumb enough to order from these clowns after having read this.

After waiting on hold for 30 min, I was yelled at and told that my address was not in delivery range and before I could even place and order I was hung up on out of no where from the Papa Johns representative. This is the worst customer service I've had without even placing an order!! Never buy from this location because they will just forward you hang up on you out of pure laziness. I am appalled! Train your employees to respect your customers
I hope you enjoy waiting an hour for your order on a night that isn't even that busy. If there were another pizza shop that were open late I'd never come here.

If I could give a ZERO, I would. Terrible customer service. Lying managers. Never got the pizza and demanded a refund. They denied me saying I can't get a refund, and that I have to spend my own money. NO. No pizza? No $! Do not order from this location.  I had to call corporate. The person at corporate had to call the store manager TWICE (the store manager lied to his own corporate person saying it was issued) to get my refund on my Visa card. Finally my refund was issued after a 3 hour ordeal.  Save $ and stress and order elsewhere.
Never received a $50 order after waiting 3 hours. Too bad Dominos doesn't deliver to our address.

The worst place ever NEVER EVER order  pizza from this place. I have been waiting for almost two hours and the pizza is still not here I have called more than twice and they keep putting me on hold for over 30 minutes.

The pizza was prepared and delivered in about 30 minutes, so it worked out perfectly with how I had timed it. The delivery guy was nice and the pizza was good, but I specifically ordered square slices and I got pie slices instead. And the extra large isn't that large? I needed a big pizza with square slices for sharing and I did not get that. The pizza is cheap, but I am gonna look around at other places.

I wish I could give 0 stars because this Papa John's location has the worst customer service that I have ever experienced with a restaurant. First of all, we were told it would be a 2 hour wait for our order, which was understandable being that it was a busy night in Chicago. We waited 2 hours & 20 minutes before calling to check on our order status only to be told that we were "behind 25 other orders," and our pizza hadn't even been started. I asked to cancel our order and to speak with a manager and was told that my name and number were being placed on a list for the manager and to expect a follow-up the next day to "make things right." No call the next day, so I followed up with the store two days later. The man who answered was extremely condescending, stating that "literally there was no way to contact (me) to say the order would be late." I think email could've worked just fine. I asked to speak to a manager, and he said he was a manager. I asked to speak to the owner, which was denied. So, then I asked for the worker's name, and he replied, "Why would I give you my name?! So you can file a complaint?!" I figured if he really was a store manager then he would be comfortable giving customers his name. Then, the man hung up on me. I tried calling back 4 times immediately after that to make sure he didn't think I hung up on him, but they just picked up and immediately hung up the line. Extremely unprofessional! Sorry for the long review, but I cannot say enough negative things about this location. I will NEVER order from them again and will honestly think twice the next time I want to order from ANY Papa John's location.
Terrible customer service. We ordered pizzas, waited 2+ hours and then they LIED and claimed that someone cancelled the order. Don't bother with them.

I've only ever ordered delivery for larger parties from this place but I've never had any complaints. The food gets where needs to go on time and I've never had any problems with order accuracy or quality. It's pizza, you know? I definitely take advantage of deals though.
Sadly the best pizza in lakeview.
This location... woof.
Seems that this Papa John's takes forever every time I order, but it's still as delicious as I expect and I keep going back!

Great location, friendly staff that are always quick to make things right if the pizza takes too long or is made incorrectly. Give the bike delivery guys mad props for braving the elements and the traffic to bring me hot pizza!
They have forgotten to bring my beverage at least 4 times.

Absolutely THE WORST customer service experience I have ever dealt with! After a no show pizza delivery they promised a free Za and when I called they said they would never deliver to me again. I was calm and nice to all 5 people I talked to the 15 times I called

I accidentally ordered from this store a month back or so instead of the Division store which is 15 minutes closer to home.  Picked up my pizza, headed home, plopped down on the couch and low and behold, there is no cheese on the pizza.  Yes, this store literally forgot to put a single shred of cheese on my pizza.  It was just pepperoni and bacon on top of sauce.  I have to laugh now thinking about the level of incompetency.  Then when I had to go back to get a replacement pizza, there was no apology, no coupon, no free 2 liter, no free dipping sauce, nothing.
The best pizza I ever had. The delivery drivers and in store workers are fast and friendly. I would totally recommend this location!

Deserves 0.  I waited 45 minutes for a single pizza (pickup), and they tried to get me to pay when I arrived in person even though I already paid online.  Then they gave me the wrong pizza.  Other customers were having similar problems.  Don't go here.

Long story short: AVOID DELIVERY FROM THIS LOCATION.  Just moved to Lincoln Park and wanted to do an easy pizza delivery after a long week. Called to place my order and after about 12 minutes of being in hold was able to do so with an employee who didn't seem to be "with it" enough to complete the order without me having to repeat my responses 3-4 times (this did not seem to be for clarification or accuracy, mind you). After being put on hold once again in order to complete the order with manager assistance (apparently my 3 topping large was too complicated to get into the system?), I was informed to expect my delivery in 1 hour. No problem, I was looking forward to unwinding after a long week anyways...  1 hour passes. 1 hour 10 minutes pass. 1 hour 20 minutes pass.  At 1 hour 30 minutes I called to check on my order and was assured the pizza had already left for delivery.  5 more minutes pass. 10 more minutes pass. 15 more minutes pass.  (I live 5 a minute drive from the location mind you).  With 1 hour 45 minutes having passed, I was fed up, called back, and canceled the order (which they did do no questions asked, which I appreciated). I also requested to speak to the manager to ensure they were aware of my experience, who informed me I should have been told the wait would have been 1 hour and 20 minutes (as if that would have been better?) but that since my order was "already on the way" that I could still have the pizza on the house.  Seemed like a kind and potentially redeeming gesture...  5 minutes pass. 10 minutes pass.  (So much for that pizza already being out for delivery)  The pizza arrives!  First look at the box, and I should have just sent it back: smushed from the weight of other boxes and slightly soggy from the pizza greese already soaked through, the box's cardboard lip was also torn straight through where the finger hole is to lift open. The warmth, or lack thereof, of this woeful excuse for a pizza box did not bode well for its contents, either: already barely luke-warm on the bottom of the box. Contained within was a pizza whose cheese had already hardened and with indents in the cheese revealing toppings that had been picked-off (I checked the box for rouge toppings that may have fallen off, but none were to be found).  So much for that "redeeming gesture", so much for my enjoyable, relaxing evening after a long week, and so much for my business with this Papa Johns location.  WILL NOT ORDER FROM THIS LOCATION AGAIN.
Awful take out experience. They all just ignored us in line for 30 minutes. Ridiculously awful staff.
Left me on hold 3 separate times in 15 minutes. I took it as a sign that I shouldn't eat pizza.

Not bad as an east coaster I tried Papa John's for the first time tonight & was pleasantly surprised. 2 large pizzas for $20 & a seamless online ordering system. Pizza arrived hot & fresh would definitely order again.
Had my first papa johns today, great inexpensive pizza.

Just as delicious as I remember it to be. Last night was a good friend's birthday and we decided to order some late-night Papa John's to re-live great college memories. Not only did it come within 20 minutes (during a Chicago snowstorm), but it was hot and delicious. They also brought extra garlic sauce upon request. ;) I'll definitely continue to order this delicious treat.
